## TileDataSourceOptions.copyrightProvider property

Optional copyright info provider for tiles provided by this data source. Copyrights from provider are concatenated with default ones from `copyrightInfo`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
copyrightProvider?: CopyrightProvider;
```
